老生: (ろうせい) - elderly person's polite reference to self
老番: (おいばん) - higher number; higher numbers
老病: (ろうびょう) - infirmities of old age
老眼: (ろうがん) - presbyopia; age-related longsightedness; farsightedness
老眼鏡: (ろうがんきょう) - reading (farsighted) glasses; spectacles for the aged
老紳士: (ろうしんし) - old gentleman; elderly gentleman
老臣: (ろうしん) - old or key retainer
老舗: (shinise) - loja antiga, loja de longa tradição; bem estabelecida, pioneira, veterana
老舗店: (ろうほてん) - old shop; shop of long standing
老若: (ろうじゃく) - young and old; all ages
老若男女: (ろうじゃくだんじょ) - (yoji) men and women of all ages
老荘思想: (ろうそうしそう) - philosophy of Lao-tse and Chuang-tse; Taoism
老衰: (ろうすい) - senility; senile decay; infirmity (through age)
老躯: (ろうく) - one's old bones; aged body
老農: (ろうのう) - elderly or experienced farmer
老酒: (ラオチュウ) - (ラオチュー is the Chinese name)  fermented Chinese alcoholic beverage (esp. Shaoxing wine) (chi: laojiu); (ろうしゅ only) old alcohol
老醜: (ろうしゅう) - ugliness of old age
老鋪: (ろうほ) - old shop/shop of long standing; well-established/first of the kind/veteran
老頭: (おいがしら) - helmet with white hair coming out of the top to make one look like an old person; kanji "old" radical at top
老頭児: (ロートル) - the aged (chi: lǎotóur); old person
老頭牌: (ろうとうはい) - {mahj} terminals (chi:); suited tiles numbered 1 or 9
老骨: (ろうこつ) - one's old bones; old man
老麺: (らあめん) - ramen (chi: lamian); Chinese-style noodles
老齢年金: (ろうれいねんきん) - old-age pension
考: (kou/kanga) - think , thought; report on one's investigation into ...; deceased father
考え: (kangae) - pensamento, ideia, opinião, conceito; ideia, noção, imaginação, pensamento, ideia, opinião, conceito; ideia, noção, imaginação; intenção, plano, projeto; consideração, julgamento, deliberação, reflexão
考えあぐねる: (かんがえあぐねる) - to be at a loss; to think and think but get nowhere; to fail to come up with a good idea
考えうる: (かんがえうる) - to be conceivable
考えつく: (かんがえつく) - to think of; to come up with
考えてみれば: (かんがえてみれば) - if you think about it; come to think of it
考えなおす: (かんがえなおす) - to reconsider; to rethink; to reassess
考えにくい: (かんがえにくい) - difficult to imagine; quite unlikely to; very doubtful; would not expect
考えにふける: (かんがえにふける) - to be absorbed in thought; to muse; to muse about; to think things through
考えに耽る: (かんがえにふける) - to be absorbed in thought; to muse; to muse about; to think things through
考えられない: (かんがえられない) - unthinkable; unimaginable
考える: (kangaeru) - to think (sobre, de), to think over, to ponder, to contemplate, to reflect (on), to meditate (on); to consider, to bear in mind, to allow for, to take into consideration , to think (about, of), to think over, to ponder, to contemplate, to reflect (on), to meditate (on); to consider, to bear in mind, to allow for, to take into consideration; to think (that), to believe, to hold (a view), to judge, to conclude, to suspect; to intend (to do), to think of (doing), to plan
考えれば考えるほど: (かんがえればかんがえるほど) - the more I think about it; the more one thinks about it
考えをまとめる: (かんがえをまとめる) - to collect one's thoughts; to gather one's thoughts; to put one's ideas in order
考えを伝える: (かんがえをつたえる) - to convey one's thoughts
考えを示す: (かんがえをしめす) - to state one's opinion
考えを纏める: (かんがえをまとめる) - to collect one's thoughts; to gather one's thoughts; to put one's ideas in order
考え中: (かんがえちゅう) - (in the middle of) considering; deliberating
考え事にふける: (かんがえごとにふける) - be absorbed in deep thought; be sunk in thought
考え事に耽る: (かんがえごとにふける) - be absorbed in deep thought; be sunk in thought
考え付く: (かんがえつく) - to think of; to come up with
考え倦ねる: (かんがえあぐねる) - to be at a loss; to think and think but get nowhere; to fail to come up with a good idea
考え出す: (かんがえだす) - to think out; to devise; to invent; to begin to think; to come up with a plan
考え合わせる: (かんがえあわせる) - to take (all of) into consideration
考え得る: (かんがえうる) - to be conceivable
考え悪い: (かんがえにくい) - difficult to imagine; quite unlikely to; very doubtful; would not expect
考え抜く: (かんがえぬく) - to think thoroughly
考え方: (かんがえかた) - way of thinking
考え様: (かんがえよう) - way of thinking; one's perspective
考え直して: (かんがえなおして) - On second thoughts ...
考え直す: (かんがえなおす) - to reconsider; to rethink; to reassess
考え込む: (かんがえこむ) - to ponder; to brood
考え過ぎ: (かんがえすぎ) - thinking too much
考え過ぎる: (かんがえすぎる) - to think too much; to be over-concerned
考え違い: (かんがえちがい) - mistaken idea; misunderstanding; wrong impression
考え難い: (かんがえにくい) - difficult to imagine; quite unlikely to; very doubtful; would not expect
考古学界: (こうこがくかい) - archeological world (archaeological); world of archeology; archeological circles
考察: (こうさつ) - consideration; inquiry; enquiry; investigation; study
考慮にいれる: (こうりょにいれる) - to take into consideration; to bear in mind
考慮に入れる: (こうりょにいれる) - to take into consideration; to bear in mind
考案: (こうあん) - plan; device; idea; invention
考案者: (こうあんしゃ) - inventor; designer; planner
考現学: (こうげんがく) - study of modern societies
考究: (こうきゅう) - investigation; researches; research; consideration; deliberation; study
考覈: (こうかく) - considering and examining; pondering and investigating
考証学: (こうしょうがく) - (in Chinese history) study of ancient texts
考課表: (こうかひょう) - personnel record; business record
耄ける: (ボケる) - to grow senile/to be childish with age; to be mentally slow/to be befuddled; to play stupid/to say something stupid (oft. on purpose; esp. as part of a comedic routine); (ほうける only) to become engrossed (in something)
